text: 18.16: Mt 19.14; Mk 10.14; 1 Ko 14.20; 1 Pi 2.2Zisas mbaram mba tari bisarirer kav mbe nzuaim, mbe ndegi gu ndegmbori mben kov ana han zim, ana khaŋ wo phorga rui gumgi ga nzuai, “Nde mba tari bisarire thɨvɨ thari, nde fhura mbe ganɨrim, mbe na han zɨri. Kha tarire fara muuŋgi gumgi gu mbigi, mbe Fhe Bakɨme wo gumgi gu mbigi ganɨrim, mbe ana piin kɨrga ntɨɨri ma.
